task.title: Replacing editable items with simple items

taskbody.prereq: The following steps assume that you have a table displayed in the Editor area. This table must contain at least one Domain column that has an editable widget.
taskbody.context: To replace an editable item (widget) in a table Domain column with a simple item:

step.cmd: In the Domain column, right-click on the editable widget that you want to replace with a simple item.
Select Set Editable Widget and then, select Value.
